profile.password_hint_self: This password encrypts your Vault. Store it somewhere safe.
profile.password_hint_caregiver: This password encrypts {name}'s Vault. You will need it each time you open their profile.
profile.password_too_short: Password must be at least 10 characters
profile.address_hint: Helps find health services near you
profile.caregiver_note_bottom: You can add your own profile after completing this one.
profile.wrong_password_recovery: Wrong password. If you forgot it, use your recovery phrase.
profile.forgot_password: I forgot my password â€” use recovery phrase
profile.recovery_instructions: Write these 12 words down on paper and keep them safe. If you forget your password, these words are the only way to recover your data.
profile.recovery_warning: This phrase will NOT be shown again. Please write it down now.
profile.recovery_confirm_checkbox: I have written down my recovery phrase
profile.recovery_failed: Recovery failed. Please check your words and try again.
profile.recover_instructions: Enter your 12 recovery words in order.
profile.recovery_print_warning: Keep this page in a safe place. Anyone with these words can recover this profile.
profile.dob_hint: Helps personalize health advice for age
profile.dob_hint_managed: Recommended for managed profiles to enable age-appropriate guidance
profile.type_self_desc: Understand your own medications, labs, and documents
profile.type_caregiver_desc: Coordinate care for a parent, partner, or family member
profile.create_heading_caregiver: Setting up a profile for someone you care for
profile.caregiver_guidance: You'll manage this profile on their behalf. You can create your own profile later.
profile.recovery_explanation: These 12 words are the only way to recover your profile if you forget your password. Without them, your data cannot be recovered.
profile.recovery_clipboard_warning: Clipboard will be cleared in 60 seconds.
profile.recovery_verify_heading: Verify your recovery phrase (optional but recommended)
profile.recovery_verify_error: That doesn't match. Please check your written phrase.
profile.no_family_hint: You can add profiles for people you care for
